thread.title: Meek Mill Disses Drake's 'Hotline Bling' Dance Moves, Responds to 'Back to Back'
thread.title_full: Meek Mill Disses Drake's 'Hotline Bling' Dance Moves, Responds to 'Back to Back'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Meek Mill Disses Drake's 'Hotline Bling' Dance Moves, Responds to 'Back to Back'
text:
Comments 'N***a's got two left feet,' the Philly rapper mocks Drizzy onstage during his appearance at a recent concert at Power 99's Powerhouse Philly 2015. 
For some reasons, Meek Mill isn't done with Drake yet. Months after starting, and losing, a war against the Canadian superstar, the Philly rapper took some shots at him while taking the stage at Power 99's Powerhouse Philly 2015 over the weekend. Some videos taken during the event and shared online by concertgoers show Meek mocking his nemesis' dance moves in his newly-released "Hotline Bling" music video. He's also featured responding to the "Is that a world tour or your girl's tour?" diss from Drizzy's "Back to Back". Meek Mill talking about Drake again. pic.twitter.com/RpBGvR91Uh — Only Hip Hop Facts (@OnlyHipHopFacts) October 24, 2015 "You ain't gonna have me up here looking like Drake on this motherf**king stage. I'm a gangster ... N***a's got two left feet," Meek made fun of Drake's dancing skill in front of the crowd. Of the lyrics from the Toronto MC's track aimed at him, Meek said, "Is that a joke? I got the hottest chick in the game, n***a!" Meek Mill revives the beef by responding to Drake's "Is that a world tour or your girls tour" line ���ï¿½ ° ¯ ¿ ½ ¯ ¿ ½ ¯ ¿ ½ pic.twitter.com/ErXyxC3GpM — 30 Second Verses (@30SecondVerses) October 24, 2015 Drake hasn't reacted to Meek's latest jab at him, and he probably will never do because his "R.I.C.O." collaborator's " dead already " to him.
